edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database

Class ManageUsersDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iastate.ansci.flip.database.ManageUsersDB

  • public class ManageUsersDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides the methods to create, update and delete an administrator, instructor and a student account.
    Author:
    Patricio Galdames

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • storeNewStudent

        public static boolean storeNewStudent(Student student,
                                      boolean register)
        Store a new Student into the database
        Parameters:
        student - : A Student object that contains the new student's profile
        register: - true: If this method was invoked from Registration class, otherwise set it as false
        Returns:
        true if the profile of the new student is not registered and the insertion of the profile was successful. Otherwise false

      • storeNewStudent

        public static boolean storeNewStudent(RegisterForm form,
                                      boolean register)
        Store a new Student into the database
        Parameters:
        form - : A RegisterForm object that contains the new student's profile
        register - : Set as true if student registration comes from registration web page, otherwise set it as false
        Returns:
        true if the profile of the new student is not registered and the insertion of the profile was successful. Otherwise false

      • deleteAdministrator

        public static boolean deleteAdministrator(java.lang.String username)
        Delete a selected administrator account
        Parameters:
        username - : Adminnistrator's username
        Returns:
        true if account was successfully deleted. Otherwise false

      • deleteStudent

        public static boolean deleteStudent(java.lang.String username)
        Delete a selected student account
        Parameters:
        username - : Student's username
        Returns:
        true if account was successfully deleted. Otherwise false

      • countStudents

        public static int countStudents()
        Count the number of registered student accounts in FLIP
        Returns:
        Number of students.

        Parameters:
        courseID - : Identifier of a chosen course
        Returns:
        : Number of students

      • getAdministrator

        public static Administrator getAdministrator(java.lang.String query,
                                             java.lang.String key)
        Retrieve at least one Administrator object that matches with the declared key.
        Parameters:
        query - : A SQL Select statement
        key - : Value of any column of the administrator table
        Returns:
        An administrator object. If no object is found, a null value is returned
